hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) forbade anticipating the fast by fasting one day before sighting (of the crescent).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صِيَامِ يَوْمِ الشَّكِّ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning fasting on the day of doubt
